name: Bill Sweeney
bio: Bill Sweeney attended Wesleyan, took his MFA at Columbia University, and worked on a doctorate at New York University. His work has appeared in Ploughshares, Another Chicago Magazine, and the Atlanta Review, among other periodicals. A teacher at the Collegiate School in Manhattan, he is circulating a book manuscript, The Immaculate Thing, and a chapbook, Father and Son.
